description:
For OptimizePress 2 Users who want to stretch what can be achieved with the fill in the box options and learn CSS (Cascading Style Sheets).

Last Updated: March 2016

Ever wondered why the clubhouse templates seem to push the bounds of OP2 layouts and how it seems impossible to achieve the same effects.

Fact is that sometime you need another weapon in your OP2 armoury - CSS.

By completing this course you will gain an intermediate level of knowledge of CSS and how it can be used to enhance OP2 Live Editor and Theme based pages.

This course is aimed at those who like to do in themselves and have hit the limits of OP2 and want to go further.

The course is taught using practical examples that you can copy and use. Better than that you will understand what you've done and be able to adapt and customise the effects and layouts to give you tons of possibilities to create engaging and attention grabbing web pages and sites.
title: CSS for OptimizePress 2
